mailman-config:
coreteam.com 192.168.0.5 25--> admin.portal pass123 iBanking Administrator support.portal pass123 iBanking Support admin.portal pass123 iBanking Notification [IBBL iBanking] Your registration request has been approved.
Dear @to@,

Congratulations!
We are pleased to let you know that your application for registration to the IBBL iBanking System has been approved by administration.

Your account has been created and put in an inactive state for security reasons. To activate your account, you may follow either of the way:

1. Activation is only the one time process and you wont require to do it after you use the activation. Please click this link to activate:
@start-link@$ACTIVATION-ACTION$?email=@profile-email@&code=@activation-code@@end-link@ $ACTIVATION-ACTION$?email=@profile-email@&code=@activation-code@ @end-link-brace@
If link doesn't work copy and paste the link in the browser.
2.If the above link does not work then to activate your account, please click the link below or go to the address
@start-link@$ACTIVATION-WEB$@end-link@ $ACTIVATION-WEB$ @end-link-brace@ and activate your account using the activation code @activation-code@
If link doesn't work copy and paste the link in the browser.

For viewing account statement online you have to follow the following link.
Address: $WEB$

And then use the following information for accessing your account:
User id: @profile-email@
Password: PASSWORD YOU PROVIDED AT SIGN-UP

Regards,

IBBL iBanking Administration
Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
Email: @admin@

N.B. If for any reason, you are in doubt about the authenticity of this mail, then please feel free to contact us at @support@.
[IBBL iBanking] Account is locked. Please check your a/c status.
Dear @to@,

IBBL iBanking has detected that, you portal account has been accessed either by some intruder or you may have given wrong user name and password several times.
Due to the security reasons our system put your portal account in a lock state.

To unlock your account (from lock status to regular status), please click on the link below
@start-link@$RESET-STATUS-ACTION$?uid=@profile-email@@end-link@ $RESET-STATUS-ACTION$?uid=@profile-email@ @end-link-brace@
If link doesn't work copy and paste the link in the browser.

Regards,

IBBL iBanking Administration
Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
Email: @admin@

N.B. If for any reason, you are in doubt about the authenticity of this mail, then please feel free to contact us at @support@.
[IBBL iBanking] Unban-request.
Dear @to@,

IBBL iBanking has detected that, suspicious/unusual access to you portal account has occurred several times by some intruder. To prevent such access we had previously put your portal account in lock state. But it seems that this type of activities was occurred repeatedly.

Due to the security reasons our system put your portal account in a ban state. To unban your account (from banned status to regular status), please click on the link below

To send UNBAN-REQ your account, please click on the link below
@start-link@$UNBAN-REQ-ACTION$?uid=@profile-email@@end-link@ $UNBAN-REQ-ACTION$?uid=@profile-email@ @end-link-brace@
If link doesn't work copy and paste the link in the browser.

Regards,

IBBL iBanking Administration
Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
Email: @admin@

This is an automatically generated e-mail. Please do not reply to this e-mail address. Thank you for your co-operation.

N.B. If for any reason, you are in doubt about the authenticity of this mail, then please feel free to contact us at @support@.
[IBBL iBanking] User Password Reset Request
Dear @to@,

Someone recently requested to change your iBanking password.

If this was you, you can set a new password follow the link:
@start-link@$FORGOT-PWD-ACTION$?uid=@profile-email@ @end-link@ $FORGOT-PWD-ACTION$?uid=@profile-email@ @end-link-brace@

If link doesn't work copy and paste the link in the browser.

If you don't want to change your password, just ignore this message.

Regards,
IBBL iBanking Administration
Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
Email: @admin@

This is an automatically generated e-mail. Please do not reply to this e-mail address. Thank you for your co-operation.

N.B. If for any reason, you are in doubt about the authenticity of this mail, then please feel free to contact us at @support@.
[IBBL iBanking] Your registration request is regretted.
Dear @to@,

Sorry!
We are sorry to let you know that your application for registration to the IBBL iBanking System was not approved by administration. It might be due to some information provided by you at registration process was not correct. Please correct that information and try again.

If you want to register again, please click this link to register:$REGISTER-USER$

***If you did not reset your password, please ignore this message.

Regards,

IBBL iBanking Administration
Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
Email: @admin@

N.B. If for any reason, you are in doubt about the authenticity of this mail, then please feel free to contact us at @support@.
[IBBL iBanking] New registration request A new registration request has been placed in the registration queue. The details are as follows: Name: @profile-name@ Email: @profile-email@ Contact Address: @profile-contact@ [IBBL iBanking] iBanking Registration Info From Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
Dear @to@,

Welcome to IBBL iBanking services.

IBBL is offering this service for you as you have shown interest about it. IBBL management has registered your account on behalf of you.

Currently available iBanking services are-

@features@

To enjoying these services you have to follow the following link.
Address: $WEB$
OR $ALTER-WEB$

Use the following information for accessing your profile:
User id: @profile-email@
Password: Please check your cell phone

*** For your safety, please change the password periodically.

For any further query related to technical support/ updating any information, please contact: @support@

Regards,

IBBL iBanking Administration
Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
Email: @admin@

[IBBL iBanking] Resetting password for eIBS a/c as requested by user
Dear @to@,

We have received a request from your side that, you wanted to change(reset) your password to access your IBBL iBanking a/c. As per request, our system had changed your password with a randomly generated password which you will receive through this mail.

Use the following information for accessing your account: Address: $WEB$
OR $ALTER-WEB$
User id: @profile-email@
Password: @profile-passwd@

For future access you will have to use this password until and unless you change your own password from our IBBL iBanking system.

****We STRONGLY recommend that you change this random generated password on your NEXT login.****

Thanks for using our system and really appreciate our clientâ€™s suggestion to make our system more user friendly. For any further query related to technical support/ updating any information, please contact: @support@

Regards,

IBBL iBanking Administration
Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
Email: @admin@

IBBL iBanking Administration
Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
Email: @admin@

Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
Based on Islamic Shariah
IBBL iBanking Service
Profile ID: @profile-profileid@
Authentication Code: @profile-authcode@
Dear Mr/Mrs.@profile-firstname@ @profile-lastname@
The information you provided needs to be verified by our iBanking Administrator.
Please bring this printed information to branch of IBBL. Activation process will be completed within 72 hours, inshallah.
Your submitted information summary is as follows:
Personal Information
First Name @profile-firstname@
Last Name @profile-lastname@
E-mail @profile-email@
Date of Birth / Incorporation @profile-dob@
Phone No @profile-phoneno@
Contact Address @profile-contactaddress@
Permanent Address @profile-permanentaddress@
Passport Number @profile-passportno@
Passport Expiry Date @profile-expdate@
Registration Date @profile-regdate@
@profile-account@
Account No Customer ID Branch Name Signature of A/C Holder
Thank You for banking with us. iBanking Administrator Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited admin.portal@islamibankbd.com Note: If any Non Resident Bangladeshi wants to register for iBanking service, s/he will have to send the signed document (last page of registration ) as attachment to the mail address: admin.portal@islamibankbd.com
For Office Use Only
Signature Checked? Account No Checked? Customer ID Checked?
Approved/Rejected ? Activation Send? Date of approval

[IBBL iBanking] Your Profile has been activated.
Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
Based on Islamic Shariah
IBBL iBanking Service
Dear Mr/Mrs.@profile-firstname@ @profile-lastname@
 

Congratulations!
We are pleased to let you know that your iBanking profile has been approved and activated by iBanking Administrator. You must take care of your password to secure your iBanking profile.

  • Make them complex,change them frequently.
  • You should memorize this password & never write it down anywhere or reveal it to anyone. 
  • Create an obscure and memorable password using passphrase and don't use common passphrases.
  • Disable Auto-complete/Password storage in-browser.

Thank You for banking with us.
